timeline.body:
```suggestion
        parser.declareObjectArray(ConstructingObjectParser.optionalConstructorArg(),
```

This should always be optional as older models could exist in the index that don't have this field.

timeline.body:
```suggestion
        PARSER.declareObjectArray(optionalConstructorArg(), Hyperparameters.STRICT_PARSER, HYPERPARAMETERS);
```

This can be non-optional once the c++ side is done.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
PARSER.declareObjectArray(constructorArg(), Hyperparameters.STRICT_PARSER, HYPERPARAMETERS);
PARSER.declareObjectArray(optionalConstructorArg(), Hyperparameters.STRICT_PARSER, HYPERPARAMETERS);

This can be non-optional once the c++ side is done.
timeline.author: benwtrent

timeline.body:
If the `Double`s and the `Boolean`  are truly not nullable, they should be `double` and `boolean` (unboxed, not nullable). 

If they are nullable, the parser needs to treat them as optional and the serialization needs to as well
timeline.bodyText:
If the Doubles and the Boolean  are truly not nullable, they should be double and boolean (unboxed, not nullable).
If they are nullable, the parser needs to treat them as optional and the serialization needs to as well
timeline.bodyHTML:
If the Doubles and the Boolean are truly not nullable, they should be double and boolean (unboxed, not nullable).

If they are nullable, the parser needs to treat them as optional and the serialization needs to as well
